Title: Relates to updating the driver's manual provided to accepted learner's permit applicants and driver education courses
Summary: Relates to updating the driver's manual provided to accepted learner's permit applicants and driver education courses to include a description of law enforcement procedures during traffic stops and the actions a motorist shall take during such stop including appropriate interactions with such officers.
